entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
